name: Micro RPG (Maribell)
description:
I'm submitting this here as a portfolio piece for an application to a game design program.

This is something I created while following a whole tutorial from Zenva Academy. It isn't much of a game yet though. I learned how to "open" chests and doors in the game, how to use Unity's particle system, and also how to set up a UI with health and XP bars.  I tweaked a few things personalizing this game, so it doesn't look like the tutorial original. I hope to work more on it in the future to make it a game worth playing.
